Hello, I am a new member of the group and I am looking for a new member.
I am looking to create content dynamically using the email creation API.

We do not want to use the template functionality.
Is it possible to create an email using a fixed layout and style, specifying only the content inside?
(To use the template feature, I would need to upgrade to the Professional plan, but I would prefer not to upgrade.)

For example, I would like to rewrite part of the GET API in the email details to
I have tried rewriting part of the API for the GET of the email details and POSTing a new one, etc., but
It did not work.

Hello all, i am new into the email template development. So my question is, i have a custom HTMl email template i created and i simply want to incorporate the first name of a the contact.

How can i do that? Is there any {{..fname }} way to do that?

Thank you very much.

Hey George, yes, that’ll be {{ contact.firstname }}.

<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/website-pages/personalize-your-content>

You can use -

`{% if contact.firstname %}Dear {{ contact.firstname }}, {% else %}Hi there! {% endif %}`
